arts.ttl: Corinthians scared off by €10m – Don’t fancy Aston Villa transfer battle
arts.sum: On Monday, we covered a claim from Portugal that Aston Villa are interested in Andrés García. The 21-year-old plays as a right-back for Levante, has started every league tie this season and contributed to six goals [three goals and three assists] for the second division Spanish club. Portuguese interest was because Sporting CP are keen The post Corinthians scared off by €10m – Don’t fancy Aston Villa transfer battle appeared first on Sport Witness.
